HelpEntry.Text: What type of option is it.

Add name of choice for that type.
Present dictionaries:
Item Type Weapon Type Armor Type Species Race Class Crafting Station Dialogue Action Mob Type Stat Functions Target Type Item Effect Type Quest Objective Type Stat Shift Requirement Stat Shift Action Requirement Currency Group Building Category State Interaction Type Ammo Type Claim Object Interaction Type Sockets Type (Added in Atavism 2018.3) Item Quality (Added in Atavism 2018.3)
